programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles. Olimpisko spēļu apskats
programme.desc: LTV7 No 8. līdz 22. februārim katru rītu - Olimpisko spēļu apskats. Ziemas olimpisko spēļu programma ir tik plaša, ka visus notikumus tiešraidēs vai ierakstos pat nevar parādīt, dienā nav tik daudz stundu. Tieši tādēļ katru dienu, sākot no svētdienas, 8. februāra, rīta stundās būs olimpiskie apskati. Tajā - par pašu svarīgāko, kas jau ir redzēts, kā arī par to, kas nav paradīts lielajās translācijās. Notikumu ir daudz, un šī ir iespēja koncentrēti gūt iespaidu par iepriekšējā dienā ziemas olimpiskajās spēlēs notikušo. Parasti apskati sāksies ap pulksten 9.30 un ilgs ap pusotru stundu, taču sacensību grafika un notikumu dēļ vēl ir iespējami nedaudz citādi sākuma laiki.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Svētdien būs uzreiz divas disciplīnas Antholcā, iedzīšanu veiks gan sievietes, gan vīrieši. Startēt varēs labākie 60 pēc sprinta rezultātiem iepriekš, turklāt startā vērā tiks ņemts sprintā uzrādītais laiks, un līdz ar to būs intervāls startā. Vispirms medaļas sadalīs vīrieši 12,5 kilometru distancē ar četrām šaušanām. Ar savu stabilo šaušanu noteikti viens no favorītiem būs norvēģis Sturla Holms Legreids, taču dažiem citiem lielāks trumpis ir ātrums, spēcīgi ir arī Francijas sportisti (īpaši Eriks Pero), itālis Tomazo Džakomels, tāpat zviedri Samuelsons un Ponsiloma, amerikānis Kempbels Raits, daudzi jaunie norvēģi. Andrejs Rastorgujevs arī labi šauj, bet svarīgi, cik augstu viņš būs bijis sprintā. Pieredze Rastorgujevam ir, taču slēpošanas ātrumā viņš vairs nav tik ātrs kā viens otrs no mūsdienu jaunajiem talantiem. Tieši slēpošanā ļoti liels progress ir Renāram Birkentālam, taču viņam ne vienmēr vienlīdz labi padodas šaušana.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Monobobu braucieni sievietēm ir interesanti, jo te neko nevar paredzēt. Olimpisko spēļu programmā monobobs sievietēm ir kopš iepriekšējām spēlēm Pekinā. Kopējais boba svars trasē ir krietni mazāks nekā divniekos, līdz ar to tas nav tik stabils trasē un ir vairāk atsitienu pret apmalēm, ir vairāk sānslīdes un kļūdu. Nav viegli noturēt pareizo līniju trasē, turklāt pašai pilotei jābūt ļoti daudzpusīgai - vienai pašai jāiestumj bobs (ko izdarīt grūtāk nekā divnieku), vienai pašai beigās arī jābremzē. Šis ir visai demokrātisks sporta veids, kas paver labas iespējas arī mazākām valstīm bobslejā, ko lieliski pierāda austrālietes Brī Volkeres panākumi pasaules visaugstākajā līmenī. Brī Volkerei gan Pekinā kļūda pirmajā braucienā maksāja medaļu, un beigās viņa bija piektā.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Otrajā braucienā visas līderes startēs beigās, lai saglabātu intrigu līdz galam. Trasi pie pagrieziena karodziņiem nedaudz izdangās, kaut ne tik traki kā slalomā, bet tik un tā pēdējām nebūs viegli, īpaši ja laika izteiksmē pārsvars pēc pirmā brauciena nebūs liels. Šajā sezonā lieliski startējusi jaunā austriete Jūlija Šeibe, kurai jau sezonas sākumā bija vairākas uzvaras pēc kārtas un kura kļuva par Pasaules kausa līderi šajā disciplīnā. Protams, nedrīkst aizmirst leģendāro amerikānieti Mikaelu Šifrinu, kuras pamatdisciplīna gan ir klasiskais slaloms, taču arī milzu slalomā viņa bieži vien cīnās par pirmo sešinieku.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Sievietēm iedzīšanā jāveic 10 kilometri, un šajā disciplīnā allaž ļoti spēcīgas ir Francijas sportistes, kas sezonas vērtējumā ieņēma pirmās divas vietas, turklāt piecas francūzietes bija labāko desmitniekā sezonā. Ja kāda Francijas biatloniste iedzīšanā neiekļūs trijniekā, tas būs pārsteigums. Vāciete Franciska Preisa iedzīšanā bija tikai trešā pērnajā sezonā, taču tik un tā ieguva kopvērtējumā galveno balvu, un viņu jāpieskaita favorītēm, tāpat kā vēl vairākas citas līderes. Interesants fakts - pētījumos pierādīts, ka stresa apstākļos, slēpojot blakus un esot varenam publikas atbalstam, sievietēm temps distancē nedaudz palēninās, taču šaušanas ātrums, gluži pretēji, palielinās. Izcili sevi vairākos posmos apliecinājusi itāliete Liza Vitoci, kura ir laba slēpotāja un ļoti laba šāvēja, viņai pat sezonā izdevies uzvarēt ar perfekti aizvērtiem visiem 20 mērķiem, kaut pirms tam sprintā viņa nav bijusi labāko sešiniekā. Ļoti stabila ir zviedriete Anna Magnusone, laba šāvēja ir vāciete Vanesa Foigta, kaut viņa nav tik ātra slēpotāja kā citas favorītes. Reiz ar 20 precīziem šāvieniem ļoti augstu bija arī jaunā Latvijas biatloniste Estere Volfa, savukārt, Baibu Bendiku bieži pievīlusi saušana.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Krosa fināls jauktajām komandām snovbordā, katrā vienībā ir pa vienam vīrietim un vienai sievietei. Iepriekšējās ziemas olimpiskajās spēlēs zelta medaļas ieguva amerikāņi Niks Baumgartners un Lindseja Džakobelisa, trijniekā tika arī Itālija un Kanāda.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Vīriešu fināls duālajā mogulā. Sacensības sākās jau no sešpadsmitdaļfināla, un beigās paši labākie tika līdz finālam. Šī disciplīna olimpiskajā programmā ir pirmo reizi, līdz tam bija tikai parastais moguls. Meistarīgi šajā sportā ir Āzijas sportisti, japāņi un korejieši, tāpat ASV, Austrālijas, arī vairāki Eiropas valstu sportisti.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Skeletonā pirmo reizi olimpisko spēļu vēsturē notiks jaukto komandu sacensības. Katrā komandā būs divi sportisti, pa vienam no katra dzimuma, kopā būs 20 komandas. Sešām skeletona lielvalstīm var būt pa divām komandām, pārējām - viena. Rezultātu skaita abu braucēju summā, te turklāt ir svarīgs arī starts un reakcijas ātrums, jo pirms starta piecas reizes iedegas sarkanās gaismas un tad pēc iepriekš nedefinēta laika tiek dots arī starts, dažkārt par pāragru startu komandai piešķir 0,5 sekundes soda laika, ir iespējama arī diskvalifikācija. Sezonas pirmajā Pasaules kausa posmā tieši Kortīnas trasē Emīls Indriksons ar Dārtu Neimani bija augstajā astotajā vietā, tiesa, toreiz pilnīgi visi favorīti nestartēja, kaut daļa piedalījās. Tagad olimpiskajām spēlēm kvalificējušies Indriksons un Marta Andžāne. Jebkurā gadījumā pie galvenajiem favorītiem jāpieskaita vācieši un briti, vērā jāņem arī austrieši, itāļi un amerikāņi, taču reāli par titulu laikam gan spējīgas cīnīties tikai divas galvenās favorītu valstis. Kopā tātad sanāk atsevišķi 40 braucieni, un sacīkstes aizritēs gana raiti.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles. Olimpisko spēļu hokeja studija
programme.desc: Latvijai vēl viena spēle turnīrā, un tā būs pret Dānijas izlasi. Pirms tās - pēdējie jaunumi no Milānas, dzirdēsiet arī mūsu sportistus un trenerus, tāpat studijā būs hokeja eksperti. Šī būs trešā un pēdējā spēle apakšgrupu turnīrā Latvijai, un pēc tās jau varētu būt zināms vietu sadalījums. "Play-off" gan varēs turpināt visas komandas, bet jo zemāk kāda būs grupā, jo potenciāli spēcīgāki pretinieki būs izslēgšanas spēlēs.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Latvijai trešā spēle C apakšgrupā ir pret Dāniju, bet tā būs jau nākamajā dienā pēc cīņas pret Vāciju, tāpēc fiziski nebūs viegli. Dānijas hokejs arī pēdējos gados gājis uz augšu, tai ir daudzi gana meistarīgi spēlētāji, kaut kopumā šī izlase nav pieskaitāma turnīra favorītēm. Un tomēr dāņiem arī ir vairāki visai meistarīgi spēlētāji NHL - kā pieredzējušais vārtsargs Frederiks Andersens, uzbrucēji Larss Ellers un Nikolajs Ēlerss. Latvijai ir jācīnās par uzvaru, lai būtu augstākā vietā un uzreiz "play-off" nevajadzētu spēlēt pret ļoti spēcīgu vienību, bet tieši tāds pats noskaņojums būs dāņiem, un arī viņiem ir savi trumpji. "Play-off" sāksies jau otrdien, katrā grupā ir pa četrām komandām, kopā ir trīs apakšgrupas. A apakšgrupā kopā spēlē Kanāda, Čehija, Šveice un Francija, B grupā - Somija, Zviedrija, Slovākija un Itālija, C grupā - ASV, Vācija, Latvija un Dānija.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Vēl viena spēle grupā, kurā spēlē arī Latvija, un pēc tās pavisam droši būs zināms vietu sadalījums. It kā ASV ir visspēcīgākā, un tai vajadzētu būt pirmajai un uzreiz iekļūt ceturtdaļfinālā, par pārējo komandu vietām nav tik viegli spriest. Vācija, Latvija un Dānija ir visai līdzvērtīgas. Viena no labākajām otro vietu ieguvējām no visām trim apakšgrupām arī uzreiz iekļūs ceturtdaļfinālā, pārējām būs "play-off jāsāk no astotdaļfināla.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Jaukto duetu sacensības visā pilnībā varēs redzēt jau naktī. Latvija nepieder pie favorītiem, te uz medaļām pretendēs skeletona lielvalstis, kam būs pa divām komandām. No Latvijas šīm olimpiskajām spēlēm kvalificējušies Emīls Indriksons un Marta Andžāne.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Svētdien būs uzreiz divas disciplīnas Antholcā, iedzīšanu veiks gan sievietes, gan vīrieši. Startēt varēs labākie 60 pēc sprinta rezultātiem iepriekš, turklāt startā vērā tiks ņemts sprintā uzrādītais laiks, un līdz ar to būs intervāls startā. Vispirms medaļas sadalīs vīrieši 12,5 kilometru distancē ar četrām šaušanām. Ar savu stabilo šaušanu noteikti viens no favorītiem būs norvēģis Sturla Holms Legreids, taču dažiem citiem lielāks trumpis ir ātrums, spēcīgi ir arī Francijas sportisti (īpaši Eriks Pero), itālis Tomazo Džakomels, tāpat zviedri Samuelsons un Ponsiloma, amerikānis Kempbels Raits, daudzi jaunie norvēģi. Andrejs Rastorgujevs arī labi šauj, bet svarīgi, cik augstu viņš būs bijis sprintā. Pieredze Rastorgujevam ir, taču slēpošanas ātrumā viņš vairs nav tik ātrs kā viens otrs no mūsdienu jaunajiem talantiem. Tieši slēpošanā ļoti liels progress ir Renāram Birkentālam, taču viņam ne vienmēr vienlīdz labi padodas šaušana.

programme.title: Milānas-Kortīnas 2026. gada ziemas olimpiskās spēles
programme.desc: Otrajā braucienā visas līderes startēs beigās, lai saglabātu intrigu līdz galam. Trasi pie pagrieziena karodziņiem nedaudz izdangās, kaut ne tik traki kā slalomā, bet tik un tā pēdējām nebūs viegli, īpaši ja laika izteiksmē pārsvars pēc pirmā brauciena nebūs liels. Šajā sezonā lieliski startējusi jaunā austriete Jūlija Šeibe, kurai jau sezonas sākumā bija vairākas uzvaras pēc kārtas un kura kļuva par Pasaules kausa līderi šajā disciplīnā. Protams, nedrīkst aizmirst leģendāro amerikānieti Mikaelu Šifrinu, kuras pamatdisciplīna gan ir klasiskais slaloms, taču arī milzu slalomā viņa bieži vien cīnās par pirmo sešinieku.

programme.title: Mani hiti
programme.desc: "MyHits TV" atskaņo gan pašmāju, gan ārzemju labākos un karstākos šībrīža hitus – rūpīgi atlasīti TOP 40 formāta ritmi jūsu ekrānā!

programme.title: UFO Europe: Untold Stories
programme.desc: Rendlesham Revisited, Mussolinis Secret UFO Files and The Swedish Mora UFO Photos. Around 3am on Dec 26th 1980, US Air Force personnel venture into the forest to investigate strange lights. Two nights later, similar lights are seen again as the Deputy Base Commander makes his way through the forest with a team. A set of unknown files describing a UFO sighting in Venice in 1936 are anonymously sent to an Italian Ufologist. The documents within purport to be a secret government report of the UFO sighting and an extraordinary government cover up that followed. The documents state the cover up was ordered by the Italian dictator, Mussolini, who was convinced the sighting was of some sort of advanced European technology. On 15th September 1952, 20 year-old Nils Frost is cycling home late one night. As he arrives at his house he sees two bright glowing lights suspended above the forest nearby.

programme.title: UFO Europe: Untold Stories
programme.desc: On 28th January 1994, pilot Jean-Charles Duboc, his co-pilot and an air steward flying an Air France flight from Nice to London see a huge brown object hovering above the outskirts of Paris. Unidentified objects are witnessed flying over the quiet provincial town of Evora, Portugal in 1959. The headmaster of a school grabs a telescope and sees something that seems to "undulate" like a "jellyfish". Danish files reveal two very similar UFO encounters that occur in Denmark some 25 years apart. In both cases a lone driver experiences electrical problems with their car before the engine cuts out and an intense bright light appears above them.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations Puerto Rico arrest 37 members of a smuggling network responsible for multiple murders, and the import and export of cocaine on the island. Air and Marine operations agents in Mayaguez chase after a loaded vessel with $5.4 million in cocaine onboard. AMO agents in Fajardo investigate a party boat and discover a passenger on board entered the country illegally.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations arrest multiple suspects across Puerto Rico involved in a drug smuggling ring linked to multiple murders. Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo seize$13.2 million worth of cocaine from an overturned vessel, while AMO agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands conduct a night operation to intercept smuggling vessels moving between the USVI and British Virgin Islands.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: A routine flight from London Heathrow to Belfast International Airport ended in tragedy when British Midland Flight 92 crashed onto a motorway embankment near the town of Kegworth on 8th January 1989. An engine failure meant the crew would have to make what should have been a straightforward emergency landing. Tragically, the pilots mistakenly identified and shut-off the wrong engine, leading to a catastrophic crash near the M1. In this episode, survivors give us their first-hand account of the horrific accident..

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot searches the vast wilds of the Yukon for the perfect place to build her new northwoods cabin. Matty discovers his Newfoundland homestead is not as ready for the fast-approaching winter as he had hoped. Billy resorts to some old-school techniques to make some new and improved outbuilding upgrades, and Emile and Gilbert take the first step on their journey to build their backwoods family dream home.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: In the Yukon, Margot finds inspiration for her cabin building project in the most unlikely of places. Billy races to make repairs to his Gaspe dream home before the fast-approaching Canadian winter arrives. With the help of a colorful neighbor, Matty breaks ground on a new wing for his Newfoundland cabin. Emilie and Gilbert take to the forests of Northern Ontario in search of essential resources for their fledgling northern home.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Brand new series: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend join forces for a sixth series in which they rescue rusty classic vehicles from their garage prisons, returning much-loved old motors to their former glory by transforming them, inside and out. Tim and Fuzz are in Norfolk to pick up Andrews 1971 Triumph GT6, a classic British two-seater sports car. This sleek coupĂ©, with its powerful straight-six, two-litre engine, was Triumphs answer to its rivals MGB GT, and is now a desirable classic. However, with petrol-head Andrew struggling with the effects of Marfan syndrome, restoring his own vehicle is now impossible, so the Car S.O.S team step in to save the day.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz take a trip to Northern France to collect 94 year old wartime hero Rogers 1968 Citroen DS , a car he has owned since new . Known as the most beautiful car ever made the iconic DS was once a real head turner, however after decades in a barn Rogers car is long past its sell by date. Tim and Fuzz struggle with the cars radical design features and once again race against time to reveal this very special car back to its unsuspecting owner.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz have picked up Adams 1984 Toyota FJ40 Land Crusier, a famous Japanese off-roader. This powerful car set the standard for 4x4 vehicles taking on the competition with its 4 litre, straight 6 engine. Its owner bought the car and used it as his daily driver but when engine problems took the car off the road Adam was unable to repair it after developing a potentially life limiting disorder. Now the Car SOS boys have stepped in to get Adams dream car back on the road and put a smile back on his face.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Master mechanics Fuzz Townshend and parts-blagging petrol head Tim Shaw are back for a brand new season of the fan favourite show Car S.O.S. The comedy duo have their work-cut out as they embark on more undercover missions rescuing classic cars and returning them in a surprise reveal to their much deserving owners. This season starts with a exhaust bang, as Tim and Fuzz are on a special mission to rescue a unique classic racing car and reunite it with a true racing legend...Sir Stirling Moss! But this 1962 Austin Healy Sebring Sprite, that once raced in a team that included Sir Stirling Moss, isnt in a fit state. But the guys have a plan to get this car back on the racetrack and Sir Stirling Moss back in the driving seat. Fuzz begins work in the garage whilst Tim goes in search of the original engine, and also finding time along the way to have a sit down with the racing legend himself. Will the Sprite be ready in time for Sir Stirling Moss to take it out for a spin? The guys also come across a supercar thats begging to be taken back to the swinging 60s, the Jaguar E-type. But the cars owner Mick is suffering from osteoporosis and has lost all hope that his beloved car will ever be back to its full glory. But Tim and Fuzz are working with Micks family in secret to restore the car and give Mick a brilliant surprise. But when they discover its a back to metal restoration this car looks like its going to be more of a head-ache than a head-turner. Other cars festering away waiting for the guys attention are Tims all-time favourite: the Audi Quattro Turbo, the 3 wheeled 1934 Morgan F4, a retro 1982 Mk1 GTI and a 1995 Nissan Skyline GTR. So start up those engines, as Tim and Fuzz return this month for the ultimate car show with a heart.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: Vikings: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Follows a crucial change of perspective. The series looks at the history of the Norsemen from the perspective of Norse mythology and at the same time provides insights into the latest bioarchaeological investigations. The range of topics ranges from the attack on the northern English monastery of Lindisfarne and the founding of Kievan Rus to the siege of Constantinople, the journey to America and the conquest of the English kingdom in 1066.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: A Roman citizen Marcus Attilius chooses to become a gladiator to clear his debts. He wins fame and admiration, becoming a peoples hero. His rise occurs as Pompeiis amphitheatre becomes a symbol of Roman dominance and spectacle. But less than two decades later, Vesuvius erupts, destroying the city. Marcuss fate remains a mystery, yet his story lives on through the legacy of Pompeiis games.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police rush to handle a rare incident on a domestic flight: something suspicious in a Serbian citizens bag. Agents find liquid cocaine disguised in drink bottles in another mans bag. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: On this episode, Antinarcotics officials at Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, face a potentially dramatic situation: a woman is arrested trying to smuggle cocaine while traveling with her two young children. Also, the detention of an elderly man reveals that drug cartels are looking for new carrier profiles. A young woman breaks down into tears when she is detained for what is apparently illegal trafficking, while a young man who was formerly imprisoned for drug trafficking in the United Arab Emirates raises the agents suspicions, who decide to interrogate him.At the loading docks, a typical Peruvian handicraft turns out to be the package of a pilot drug shipment, and a Chinese citizen who tried to evade security controls to traffic maca bulbs must face the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303 was near the end of its 90-minute journey from Lahore to Karachi when it dramatically crashed on 22 May 2020. While attempting a second approach after a failed landing, the Airbus A320 tragically collided with a densely populated residential area of Karachi only a few kilometres from the runway. In this episode, we hear from one of only two survivors of the horrific crash..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Compared to the number of suicides in the general population, suicidal pilots are almost statistically non-existent. But when they do emerge from obscurity to unleash their horrific plans on innocent passengers, the destruction they inflict is epic. A 737 cruising above an Indonesian jungle suddenly plummets from the sky. An Airbus A-320 crashes into the French Alps. And, Malaysian Airlines Flight 370 vanishes over the South China Sea, and remains one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Sometimes the trust between pilots and their planes breaks down, and the cockpit inadvertently becomes a struggle that pits man against machine. Eager crowds gather at an air show to watch the new pride of French aviation, but witness a fiery disaster instead. During a routine test flight, one of the worlds most advanced planes nosedives into the Mediterranean. And, when a packed Airbus disappears over the Atlantic, investigators face a two-year deep-sea search for answers.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Gladiators capture the imagination like no other aspect of Ancient Rome. But who were they and what was the secret of their appeal? We follow a new season of excavations to find answers. Teams scale the façade of Romes famous Colosseum, decipher warrior tombstones and unearth an extraordinary lost amphitheatre in Turkey, transforming the popular image of savage and bloodthirsty gladiator combat.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Pompeii was a thriving town on the southern coast of Italy, until it came to a sudden end in 79AD. The eruption of a nearby volcano, Mount Vesuvius, erupted, burying the city in millions of tonnes of ash and debris. Now excavators are digging to unearth the dark side of this idyllic Roman town by uncovering an enslaved persons room.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The Roman Empire was truly global, covering thousands of miles and thousands of inhabitants. New archaeological discoveries paint a clearer picture everyday life back then. A lavish Pompeii villa, preserved in time by the eruption of Vesuvius, showcases the very different lives between the wealthy who lived there and the enslaved who ran the operation. In Jordan, an untouched tomb is uncovered; its art tells the story of the citys history, revealing the cultural melting pot of citizens in a city at the edge of the empire. In that same town, archaeologists analyze the construction of a theater where all citizens were welcome. Final

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: Thord and Bjoern join forces when a truck threatens to tip down a hill. As it teeters on the balance, Bjoern plans to climb a ladder to secure a strap until Thord puts a stop to it. On an iced-up mountain track, Domenic and Thords daughter, Malin, head out to rescue a van but fail to reach it. Thord joins them on a rescue that makes him realise theres a fine line between life and death. In the north, Jo Roger calls in reinforcements for a triple rescue of a truck, van and drill rig.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police rush to handle a rare incident on a domestic flight: something suspicious in a Serbian citizens bag. Agents find liquid cocaine disguised in drink bottles in another mans bag. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

A young woman breaks down into tears when she is detained for what is apparently illegal trafficking, while a young man who was formerly imprisoned for drug trafficking in the United Arab Emirates raises the agents suspicions, who decide to interrogate him.At the loading docks, a typical Peruvian handicraft turns out to be the package of a pilot drug shipment, and a Chinese citizen who tried to evade security controls to traffic maca bulbs must face the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: At the end of the last Ice Age, the first humans migrated into the Americas. Some believe they travelled overland, but now archaeologists are looking to the coast. And what does a 13,000-year-old skeleton found in the Mexican jungle tell us about these people and their world? By draining ta deep, underground cave, we reveal the new science rewriting the epic story of the first humans to live in the New World

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Once known as Queen of the Adriatic, Venice conquered the eastern Mediterranean, but how did her fleet enable her to become a maritime empire? The wreck of a 14th-century war galley uncovers Venices naval secrets; the wrecks of merchant ships reveal how Venice became an economic powerhouse; and how mass graves uncovered on a Venetian island show Venice faced an enemy which even she couldnt conquer.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated

In this episode, we hear from one of only two survivors of the horrific crash..

programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when paragliding, riding dirt-bikes and being subjected to a wedgie.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Bucking the medical system, maverick doctors have pioneered breakthrough cancer therapies. By supercharging T-Cells and coupling them with deactivated HIV, doctors in Philadelphia save the lives of Stage Four patients thought beyond hope. In France, genetic engineers create "universal donor" T-Cells that could revolutionize cancer therapy.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Small, cheap commercial drones are everywhere, and theyre being used for anything you can imagine. Most people use them for good?but in the wrong hands, they could be weapons of mass destruction. The military and defense industry are looking for ways to defend against this new threat?and it all comes to a head in the week-long Game of Drones.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A380 Turnaround Coordinator, Diana orchestrates Cargo, Ground Operations and Baggage Services to get the biggest passenger plane off the ground. Night works on a new taxiway mark the beginning of an airport wide upgrade and an I.T. outage stops international passengers at the border as the Integrated Operations Centre swing into action to resolve congestion.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: An intrepid team of investigators in Denver and Salt Lake City reunites travelers with such lost items as a priceless Native American regalia, a taxidermied rat, a high school wrestling state championship ring, and a fanny pack with a wallet, passport and government IDs. Plus, we head down south to visit Unclaimed Baggage, a store brimming with a plethora of lost airport items shoppers can buy.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: An Airside Electrical team investigates faulty airfield lights and finds that rodents, taking refuge from the brutal Canadian winter, have damaged the cabling. On the ramp, high winds make loading cargo difficult, and mean jets cant start their engines without help from one of the unsung heroes of the airport. And in security screening a scan reveals possible explosives in a passengers baggage. Final

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Outside Draskow, Poland, an undocumented cemetery hundreds of years old is found in 2010 containing a womans skeleton with a blade on her stomach, a stone on her neck and a green color in her mouth. Was this strange burial a precaution against the living dead? During the cold war, the United States developed a surveillance tool that was the first of its kind—code name: Project Corona. Did the shiny golden dome really help avert nuclear Armageddon? Countless literati have studied Shakespeares plays for his profound prose, but what about for secret-coded messages? In the 1800s, Dr. Orville Ward Owen built a hulking wooden machine to do just that and concluded that Shakespeare was not who we think. Does his theory stand up to scrutiny?

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: The ancient Incas ruled over most of South America 500 years ago. Their empire spanned the continent with roads, temples and mysterious cities built to incredible precision. Amazingly they achieved it all without a written language. Archaeologists today believe they may have discovered how this ancient civilization communicated. And it could be a three dimensional language - made from knots. Anthropologist Dr Sabine Hyland attempts to decode the sacred knotted relics known as khipus, and crack the intricate code of the Incas. Also in this episode the Vikings. They were a feared race of seafaring warriors, with powers of navigation far ahead of their time. They discovered America almost 500 years before Columbus. But how did they cross vast oceans to raid, trade and plunder? What was their secret?

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: According to the Gospels, the Crown of Thorns was worn by Jesus Christ during his crucifixion, and is today one of the Catholic religions most sacred relics. Fr. Patrick Hough, a Jesuit priest, investigates a relic said to be the real Crown, protected in Paris at the Cathedral of Notre Dame. He explores a thorn from the Crown that appears to miraculously bleed. And the construction of a crown using thorns found around Jerusalem may shed new light on Christs crucifixion. Also in this episode, a series of mummies, over 600 years old, have been found in remote part of the mountainous regions of Peru.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 19 July 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 was making its regularly scheduled flight from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure to the tail-engine. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash but thanks to the incredible crew, 184 people survived the fifth-deadliest crash involving a DC-10. In this episode we hear from multiple survivors as well as the first-officer, Bill Records, who gives a rare first-hand account from the cockpit, of what could have been the crews final moments..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest air crashes in history have been caused by simple misunderstandings, and its a tiny error in the cockpit that brought tragedy to Quincy Airport in Illinois. Meanwhile, a minor mistake, a non-standard approach, and heavy smoke add up to a tragic misunderstanding that cost the lives of everyone on board Garuda Indonesia Flight 152. And, however disastrous, never has a misunderstanding taken as devastating a turn as on the island of Tenerife and the single deadliest aviation accident of all time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Safety in the sky depends on the outcome of air crash investigations. But sometimes investigators disagree, and the pressure intensifies when the victims are famous. A crash carrying the Manchester United football team sparks an international argument. A storm of controversy ignites when a planeload of US military personnel goes down in a fiery blaze. And, conspiracy theories erupt on both sides when the president of Poland is killed in a crash en route to Russia.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the newly discovered tomb complex at Saqqara, one burial chamber stands out. It holds a single, stone sarcophagus while the rest are packed with mummies. Dr Ramadan Hussein and his team face their biggest challenge yet as they battle to lift the 5 ton lid and reveal the mummy within. Using forensic investigation techniques and the latest technology, what secrets can they discover about the tombs 2600-year old owner?

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: Inside the ancient Egyptian necropolis of Saqqara, Dr Ramadan Hussein and his team work to uncover a unique tomb complex. Ramadan is intrigued by a wall at the bottom of the 100 foot shaft. A hunch tells him it could be a hidden burial chamber. What secrets could it hold? The team have to work fast to remove the unstable rock, but their risky search leads them to one of the biggest discoveries of the dig so far.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: 75 BCE, Spartacus, a soldier enslaved by Rome and forced into gladiatorial combat leads fellow gladiators in a daring escape. Disaffected slaves join him, sparking a massive rebellion that defeats Roman legions. His story shows how closely linked gladiators were to the politics of the Roman Republic. Though hes ultimately defeated, his legacy lives on as a symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Spiculus, Neros favourite gladiator, becomes a superstar in Romes brutal arenas. Rewarded with wealth and privilege, he fights for glory as Nero uses lavish games to display his power. After the Fire of 64 CE, Neros spectacles grow grander. When his reign finally collapses, Nero calls for Spiculus to kill him - but dies by his own hand. Spiculuss fate remains a mystery, his legend enduring.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Built on ambition and driven by ingenuity, the Roman Empire developed innovations that are still being studied today in new archaeological discoveries. Experts explore the Stabian Baths of Pompeii, which are extraordinarily preserved from the eruption of Vesuvius. Its pristine state allows archaeologists to study the remarkable mechanics of the heating systems behind this important meeting place, built over two millennia ago. In the heart of Rome, right next to the Vatican, a magnificent amphitheater built for Emperor Neros personal pleasure boasts his ostentatious pride in bold displays of power. Outside Naples, underwater archeologists dive into the Bay of Puteoli to discover a granary, a cornerstone of the grain trade whose profits fueled ambitious constructions all throughout the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: A Roman citizen Marcus Attilius chooses to become a gladiator to clear his debts. He wins fame and admiration, becoming a peoples hero. His rise occurs as Pompeiis amphitheatre becomes a symbol of Roman dominance and spectacle. But less than two decades later, Vesuvius erupts, destroying the city. Marcuss fate remains a mystery, yet his story lives on through the legacy of Pompeiis games.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: The Tale of Sylian
programme.desc: Nikola, a farmer grappling with the harsh reality of new economic policies, is unable to sell his land or crops. When his family leaves in search of a better life abroad, he takes a job as a landfill attendant, where he encounters the injured white stork Silyan. As Nikola nurses the bird back to health, an unlikely bond forms between man and animal.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A380 Turnaround Coordinator, Diana orchestrates Cargo, Ground Operations and Baggage Services to get the biggest passenger plane off the ground. Night works on a new taxiway mark the beginning of an airport wide upgrade and an I.T. outage stops international passengers at the border as the Integrated Operations Centre swing into action to resolve congestion.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: An intrepid team of investigators in Denver and Salt Lake City reunites travelers with such lost items as a priceless Native American regalia, a taxidermied rat, a high school wrestling state championship ring, and a fanny pack with a wallet, passport and government IDs. Plus, we head down south to visit Unclaimed Baggage, a store brimming with a plethora of lost airport items shoppers can buy.

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South America is a land of extremes. Many hundred thousand square miles of forests, grasslands and mountains. Survival is a daunting proposition. But when the going gets tough, the wild inhabitants morph into oddballs. Millennia of weird evolution have made this giant continent a land of mutants. Expect the unexpected because here, outlandish is the new normal.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Enchanted Islands. We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: One of the most unique countries in the world is made up of over 7,600 islands, with more than 20 active volcanos. Besides that, the Philippines is covered in rich green forests, while its beaches are full of coral reefs. All this makes it one of the most bio-diverse places on the planet and a home to many wonderful and unusual species.

programme.title: Asias Killer Hornets
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, shell quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Water shapes northern Argentina, creating paradises for unique wildlife. Whether its sooty swifts swooping through waterfall floodwaters, frogs glowing in the dark, cute coati families in the undergrowth, or mighty anacondas on the prowl. Argentinas wetlands hold many wonders. In magnificent images, the film celebrates Argentinas water-rich north as a hotspot of biodiversity and shows how drought and fires threaten the fragile ecosystem.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Enchanted Islands. We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines

programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, shell quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Worlds Biggest Bullshark
programme.desc: Ecologist, Dr. Neil Hammerschlag teams up with former commando, James Glancy and Evolutionary Biologist, Dr. Toby Daly-Engel to uncover how Big Bull grew to become a giant and find out if there could be more like her.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Embark on a spectacular journey around the world in search of natures deadliest predators. See how mammals, insects, fish, and birds fight for survival using a fascinating combination of hunting strategies.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses break all the rules on animal intelligence. Born into the world as orphans, they are self-taught masterminds; capable of solving complex problems, strategizing, even planning for the future. Extraordinary superpowers that are the secret to their success.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses were always thought to be natures ultimate loners, preferring their own company. The truth is they have secret social lives. From moms to be hanging out in the deep in their hundreds to an octopus capable of coworking with another species. These aliens of nature are more sociable than ever imagined.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

Expect the unexpected in places like no other, as the series heads to extraordinary locations including the rugged islands of Indonesia and the grasslands of Mongolia.

programme.title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwanges lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africas most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecils story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Asias Weirdest
programme.desc: Asias natural world is full of weird wildlife. The largest continent on Earth has more than its fair share of peculiar plants and abnormal animals, and this documentary series delves deep into its wild landscapes to reveal some of the strangest species on offer. Expect the unexpected in places like no other, as the series heads to extraordinary locations including the rugged islands of Indonesia and the grasslands of Mongolia.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. With cutting edge visual effects, we explore far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isnt enough. Shes constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwanges lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africas most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecils story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Super Cat
programme.desc: Take Kobe Bryants ability to jump, add Michelle Kwans grace and beauty, then mix well with Stephen Hawkings problem-solving genius -- and youve got the recipe for Super Cat. Weve combined the most amazing features of big cats to showcase the most awe-inspiring capabilities ever seen in action. Watch this ultimate feline live all nine lives as its superpowers of strength, endurance and stealth are put to the test.

programme.title: The Real Black Panther
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Theres a new challenger in the Kabini Forest of India, one unlike all leopards that came before him. This is the story of Saya, the real black panther, and his rise to power.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Tourists capture the best moments in the wild with their phones, and the big cats are at the top of everyones safari wish list. Hold on as an elephant charges with a lion in its tusks. Watch male leopards in a turf war, and beware of one mother leopards hunting school. Cheetahs confront crocodiles to protect their meal. Large buffalo herds gather as a lone lion shows why he is king.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Lions. A look at the strategies adopted by a pride of South African lions as they hunt zebras, impalas and giraffes in the Singita Game Reserve.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And shes the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs.

programme.title: Oceans Weirdest

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Suņi uzzina, ka Celtne ir slepena skeitošanas zvaigzne! Bet, būvējot skeitparku, viņiem jārisina problēma ar cementa maisījumu. // Pilsētā ieradīsies Čārdžera mīļākā dziedātāja Sjerra Spīdošā... Ja suņi spēs uzbūvēt tuneli viņas turnejas autobusam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Reksu ģimene dodas ceļojumā cauri galaktikai, lai nokļūtu Raķešpasaulē. Tims un Kaja cīnās par Terijas rezerves biļeti uz Kosmoslendu. Tims, Tija un Tomijs rīko talantu šovu, bet nevar izlemt, kurš uzstāsies pirmais.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kad Barbatēta dzīve parādās Barbamamma un barbabērni, viņa māja paliek par mazu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu strādā pie tā, lai izglābtu Čārdžera dzimšanas dienas ballīti!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš un Karte palīdz tēvocim Tesoro atrast pazaudētos dārgumu pēddziņus un atkal kļūt par dārgumu karti. Dora un Zābaciņš pēta noslēpumainu atslēgu, lai iepazītu Doras vecvecvecmāmiņu - pašu pirmo zinātkāro pētnieci.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs. Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni. Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.
